serviceName: Apply to strike off and dissolve a company
P100: Use this service to apply to close a public limited company, a private limited company, or a limited liability partnership (LLP).
P200: For companies with multiple directors, more than half of the directors need to sign the application before it can be submitted.
P300: It costs Â£8 and you'll need:
P400: to sign in to or create a Companies House account, which is different from a WebFiling account
P700: an email address for each person signing the application
P800: to pay using a credit or debit card, or a Companies House account
P900: You can also sign in to this service to download a copy of your application after it has been submitted.
